startPage.title: cyDocument upload proof of concept
startPage.description: cyWThis is a proof of concept for the CUI upload document journey.
startPage.whatYouNeedText2: cyA PCSCase reference to associate the document to
startPage.expectedBehavior: cWhen you upload a document to the associated case reference, you should see a message confirming the document has been uploaded.
startPage.expectedBehavior2: cyYou should see the document in the JSON structure for pcsCase table.

page2.title: cyUpload Document
page2.caseReferenceHint: cyUpload any docuemnts that you think are relevant to your response for case reference:
page2.fileUploadHint: cyGive them a name that explains what they are. For example, 'Receipt of payament from Jane Smith'
page2.fileUploadHint2: cyEach docuemtn must be less then 1GB. You can upload the following file types: DOC/PDF.

errors.fileRequired: cyPlease select a file to upload
